author: stsp
msg: * subversion/tests/cmdline/svntest/main.py: Stop showing the log level of each
line in the log. It clutters the output and makes it hard to copy/paste
test output for reuse during test development.

author: bodewig
msg: Add a few comments as earmarks for myself, I think this is what the code does.  Two 'final's thrown in for good measure

author: stsp
msg: Disable logging with timestamps in the test suite by default.
Add a new option --log-with-timestamps that enables timestamp logging.
The output with timestamps is often too long to fit in 80 columns and it
makes copy/pasting test output harder (e.g. when fixing up expected output
(log_with_timestamps): Remove this global flag. It is now an option.
(execute_tests): Use the timestamp logging formatter if --log-with-timestamps
was specified on the command line.

author: ilgrosso
msg: Generating source JAR files including correct LICENSE and NOTICE files

author: ilgrosso
msg: Simple BASH script to check that all artifacts provide the right LICENSE and NOTICE files
